title: Watts Library reaches out
creator_credit: ACI Films, Barbara H. Clark and Dennis E. Lew
brief_description: Librarianship is more than just cataloguing and handling books. In the Watts Branch of Los Angeles Public Library, librarians try every avenue to reach and help the community.
